sentences.en: A mouse leads a clandestine life below the ground.
sentences.cn: 一只耗子能够引向地底之下的秘密生命.

sentences.en: Drunkard thinks he also has the experience of carry on a clandestine love affair, say: Hey!
sentences.cn: 酒鬼一想自己也有偷情的经历, 便说: 哎!

sentences.en: For instance, some clandestine publications are beautifully produced. Well, where did the paper come from?
sentences.cn: 举例说, 有些秘密刊物印得那么漂亮, 哪儿来的纸?

sentences.en: She can not let anyone know, including the clandestine manufacture of men.
sentences.cn: 她不能让任何人知道, 包括制造秘密的男人.

sentences.en: So my first schooling was in Mandarin , in a clandestine class run by a married couple.
sentences.cn: 我的华文启蒙教育是从成保路的这所房子开始的, 秘密给我们上课的是一对夫妇.

sentences.en: That mystery happens to be that of the even clandestine, black hole.
sentences.cn: 这就是一直以来处于扑朔迷离之中的黑洞.

sentences.en: The CIA is running ads on stations across the country for jobs in its clandestine service.
sentences.cn: 中情局正在全球电台发放招募间谍的广告.

sentences.en: The early Christians held clandestine meetings in caves.
sentences.cn: 早期的基督徒在洞穴中秘密聚会.

sentences.en: They had a clandestine meeting in the park yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天他们在公园开了个黑会.

sentences.en: This be the good place carrying on a clandestine love affair absolutely!
sentences.cn: 这绝对是个偷情的好地方!

sentences.en: To dramatize the necessity of clandestine warfare, instructors objectively recited case histories and their import.
sentences.cn: 为了说明秘密战的必要性, 教官们客观地讲述了案例及其意义.

words.tran_cn: 秘密的，私下的；偷偷摸摸的
